definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Mining minister said immediately come forward to clarify earlier in the ghost story.
sentences.chinese: 采臣见状立即上前澄清早前遇鬼的说法。

sentences.english: Katona applied early to the University of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 卡托纳早前申请了弗吉尼亚大学。

sentences.english: He recalled the geography from earlier.
sentences.chinese: 他回忆起早前看到的地理。

sentences.english: Earlier, most spinners were holding their hopes to import cotton from India.
sentences.chinese: 早前，大多数纺纱厂希望从印度进口棉花。

sentences.english: Though we slept early last night, we woke up at six, crazy!
sentences.chinese: 早前爸爸经学校订购的曲奇，今天终于收到了。

sentences.english: Guo earlier denied dating Mr Fok.
sentences.chinese: 郭晶晶较早前否认和霍启刚拍拖。

sentences.english: Some earlier research produced similar findings, but overall results have been inconsistent.
sentences.chinese: 较早前的研究也有类似的发现，但结论时有出入。

sentences.english: Earlier, a Catholic priest had approached the state health department with the same demand.
sentences.chinese: 早前另一名天主教神父也曾向衞生部提出同样要求。

sentences.english: Capello has also met the FA's new chairman, David Bernstein.
sentences.chinese: 这位足协新掌门早前曾担任曼城俱乐部主席。

sentences.english: Europeans shad previously captured Squanto and forced him into slavery.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人早前就俘虏了斯匡托，逼迫他成为奴隶。

sentences.english: A television program of cross century try showed months before the test was thrown stone to detect the road.
sentences.chinese: 早前的一个电视节目“跨世纪的审判”则是投石问路。

sentences.english: Other early warning systems used in parts of Africa provide only several weeks to prepare.
sentences.chinese: 早前在非洲使用的预警系统只能提前数周进行预报。

sentences.english: Previously, US nationals could obtain visas in as little as one day.
sentences.chinese: 早前，美国国民仅须一天时间就可获得签证。

sentences.english: A former subsatellite would help explain some of the mysteries of Iapetus, one of Saturn's moons.
sentences.chinese: 土卫八早前的子卫星将会帮助解释某些自身的秘密。

sentences.english: But it was addressed to Philemon, beyond doubt, on the earlier occasion.
sentences.chinese: 但它给利蒙，毫无疑问，就较早前的场合。

sentences.english: It is traversed by the urethra as well as the two ejaculatory ducts described earlier.
sentences.chinese: 其实质有尿道和早前描述过的射精管穿过。

definition: in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
the other day/a few days ago
late last year/the end of last year
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
